content: I hope you do stay. You perform the function of offering a dissenting voice and doing it well. There aren’t many others doing that. SJW group think is rampant on Medium. Last year I was banished for challenging that. Thinks are actually a little less quarrelsome now than then. But mostly because you are an excellent writer, capable of present a logical, sustained argument. The mostly Millenials one encounters here never learned how to do that. It is refreshing to read someone who can and will.
